comment: The union of two finite sets is finite. Part of Corollary 6K of [Enderton] p. 144. This version of ~ unfi is useful only if we assume the Axiom of Infinity (see comments in ~ fin2inf ). (Contributed by NM, 22-Oct-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Apr-2015.)
